analyzed: 作此印時。 百億諸佛。
translated: When making this seal,🔽one hundred koṭis of buddhas,
one hundred koṭis of bodhisattvas,
one hundred koṭis of vajra-holders,
the four heavenly kings,
and their troops,
all come to protect and think of [the practitioner].
Cause [the practitioner] to realize unsurpassed perfect supreme enlightenment.
All evils,
if they see one who holds the seal,
will all give rise to kindness and obedience.
They will not give rise to evil thoughts.

original: 若王難兵難刀難欲害人者。
analyzed: 若王難兵難刀難欲害人者。
translated: If there are difficulties with the king, soldiers, or knives, and someone wishes to harm others,
form this seal and recite the mantra.
Forty-nine times.
The evil thieves will be bound by themselves.
Ask the mind to report.
If it is not understood, one will never be able to know.
Because this mudra has great and powerful efficacy.

original: 佛頂身印。🔽反叉左右二無名指。
analyzed: 佛頂身印。 反叉左右二無名指。
translated: The Buddha's head body mudra.🔽Cross the left and right ring fingers.
The two little fingers are in the palm, straight up.
The tips of the two middle fingers support each other.

original: 屈二食指頭。🔽壓中指上節背。
analyzed: 屈二食指頭。 壓中指上節背。
translated: Bend the tips of the two index fingers.🔽Press the back of the middle joint of the two middle fingers.

original: 并竪二大指捻中指中節側。
analyzed: 并竪二大指捻中指中節側。

The index fingers come and go.

crossing over each other.
And bend the two thumbs,
placing them inside the palm.
First place it on top of the head,

Recite the mantra with utmost sincerity, saying:

original: 唵一室唎二合夜二娑醯莎訶奉請印。
analyzed: 唵一室唎二合夜二娑醯莎訶奉請印。

The same as the previous body mudrā,
change the two index fingers to be straight,
four and a half inches apart.
And the two thumbs straight,
eight fen away from the middle fingers.
Recite the Buddha's heart mantra,
until the fourth essential.
The two index fingers gradually bend into the palm,
reciting the mantra eleven times.

original: 及手印和南頂禮向內散去。
analyzed: 及手印和南頂禮向內散去。

The invocation mudrā.

The lotus supports the feet,
also called the flower light mudrā.
The two little fingers stand and touch each other,

analyzed: 并二大指自餘六指散開直竪。

Slightly bending the finger joints.
With the gesture of an opening flower.
Recite the mantra seven times.
And bend the two thumbs toward the palm.
Then bow inside.
Disperse the lotus flower mudra.
The mantra for the seat says:

Snap your fingers three times.

Recite this mantra seven times.

Wash and recite seven times.

Oṃ bāṃ vajra maṇi dhari hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā. Recite this seven times,
it is like washing with fragrant water.
It also eliminates offenses and defilements.

translated: The two thumbs are extended and pinch the sides of the nails of the two middle fingers.

Oṃ gu ru ta na hūṃ phaṭ. Make this mudrā and recite this mantra three times.

As usual, go to one place.
Hold some soil to clean the hands.
And rinse the mouth and teeth.
The thumb, index finger, and middle finger of the right hand,
with the ring finger slightly bent,
and the little finger bent like a hook.

Recite the mantra over water seven times.
Rinse your mouth and teeth.

analyzed: 并飲灑掃解一切金剛鬼神。

Cross your hands and palms back to back.
Imagine being angry.
Recite the mantra twenty-seven times.
Then quickly turn your hands over.
Properly join your palms.
And recite seven more times.
Then with both hands.
Quickly clap them open.
The mantra of the Four Heavenly Kings says:

translated: Oṃ jūṇi ki la ya svāhā. Recite once.
Use the mudrā to touch the ground once.
Like the shape of grass.

original: 三度作印。🔽結外火院火界契其契以左手蜜掩。
analyzed: 三度作印。 結外火院火界契其契以左手蜜掩。
translated: Perform the mudrā three times.
Form the outer fire altar fire boundary mudrā. The mudrā is to cover the left hand with the right hand, with the backs of the hands touching and straight up.
The two thumbs are about two inches apart.
The wonderful words are:

original: 唵阿三麼祇儞𤙖莎嚩訶誦三遍。
analyzed: 唵阿三麼祇儞𤙖莎嚩訶誦三遍。
translated: Oṃ a sa ma gi ni hūṃ svāhā. Recite three times.
Use the mudrā to rotate to the right three times.
That is it.

original: 唵吉多利吉復次若患癩惡瘡。
analyzed: 唵吉多利吉復次若患癩惡瘡。
translated: Oṃ jita ri jita. If you suffer from leprosy or evil sores,
if you have pain in the body,
consecrate water seven times and bathe the body to be cured.
Next, if you are bitten by a centipede,🔽snake, scorpion,
dragon, beast,
tiger, wolf,🔽lion,
horse, pig, dog, etc.,
consecrate the place with water once and wash it.
It will disappear.
Next, there is a method.

original: 若被符晝呪詛𭼩蠱成病者。
analyzed: 若被符晝呪詛𭼩蠱成病者。
translated: If someone is bewitched by a daytime curse or becomes ill from a spell,
chant the mantra over seven grains of black mustard seeds,
and strike the patient with them.
As soon as they are struck, they will know the location of the spell.
Then chant the mantra once more,
and pour it over the top of their head.
They will be cured.
Next, if someone is ill,
and it is caused by a ghost,
one should order the Four Heavenly Kings
to protect the patient.

original: 呪石榴枝一遍打虛空中。
analyzed: 呪石榴枝一遍打虛空中。
translated: Enchant a branch of pomegranate once and strike the air,
causing the patient to speak their name.

original: 復次若婁瘡病或一日二日發。
analyzed: 復次若婁瘡病或一日二日發。
translated: Next, if someone has a festering illness that breaks out every one or two days,
or every three days,
enchant a handful of ash,
and use it to surround the patient.
They will then be cured.

original: 差復次若有一切法不成驗。
analyzed: 差復次若有一切法不成驗。
translated: Next, if all the methods do not work,
it is because there are karmic hindrances on the body.
Take water from an eastern flowing stream, enchant it seven times,
and pour it over the head of the enchanter.
One will then obtain spiritual efficacy.
Cause the enchanted spirit to give rise to attachment in the mind.
Next, within the body of the enchanter,
If there are obstacles and difficulties,
take one part of ox bezoar,
chant over it seven times,
and apply it to the hairline to be free from obstacles.

original: 復次若有毒藥之所害者。
analyzed: 復次若有毒藥之所害者。
translated: Furthermore, if someone is harmed by poison,
chant over indigo or well water,
chant it once,
and pour it into the nose.
It will be cured.
Furthermore, seven times with one pint of well water,
at sunrise,
face the sun and drink it yourself.
All illnesses will be cured.
Sprinkle the remaining water towards the sun.
All sentient beings in the world,
with all their illnesses and obstacles,
will all be eliminated.
Furthermore, chant over water once,
and one grain of white mustard seed,
chant it once,
and sprinkle the water in the house.
Enchant seven grains of white mustard seed,
and bury them in the house.
All ghosts and spirits will not enter.

analyzed: 復次有法。 呪水一遍。
translated: Furthermore, there is a method.🔽Enchant water once,
and use it to sprinkle on the head.

original: 及洗面一切口舌官事消滅。
analyzed: 及洗面一切口舌官事消滅。
translated: And when washing the face, all lawsuits will be resolved.
People will see you with joy.
Next, there is a method.

original: 若涉大海江河山川曠野。
analyzed: 若涉大海江河山川曠野。
translated: If you are traveling on the great ocean, rivers, mountains, or wilderness,
Consecrate water with one recitation of the mantra.
Then go without fear.

original: 復次若山谷中林中空閑處。
analyzed: 復次若山谷中林中空閑處。
translated: Next, if you are in a mountain valley, a forest, or an empty place,
Burn incense and scatter flowers.
Recite the mantra.
All buddhas,
bodhisattvas,🔽celestial dragons,
and spirits
will all come and manifest their bodies.
They will expound the wonderful Dharma for you,
and even bestow the elixir of immortality.
Next, if you suffer from wind illness,
headaches,
or a feverish pain in the face and eyes,
Recite the mantra once over ghee, curd, and honey,
and apply it to heal.
Next, if there is an evil person
who wishes to harm you,
before the sun has risen,
sincerely recite the mantra three times.
All slanderous and evil people
will naturally be eliminated.
Next, there is a method.
If you wish to seek others' wealth,
recite the mantra seven times, and you will obtain it all.
Next, in a clean room,
burn incense and recite the mantra.
All celestial maidens will appear in person.
They will perform heavenly music,
make offerings to the mantra master,
and either seek it from him or
heavenly food and drink, all according to one's wishes.
Next, if two people dislike each other,
recite the mantra once over water and sprinkle it on the doors of both of them.
They will both give rise to joy.
Next, if one is buying and selling in the market,
recite the mantra once over peacock feathers.
Carry it with you.
One will obtain great benefits.
Next, if someone dies suddenly
and it has been three days,
recite the mantra twenty-one times.
Then, recite the mantra over a pomegranate branch,
and strike the top of their head seven times, and they will revive.
Next, if someone dies suddenly
and is struck by a ghost,
recite the mantra over water once
and sprinkle it on their face.
They will immediately recover.
Next, if in a stupa,
or in a pure room,
take the pure soil,
mix it with sandalwood,
and make a square altar with three levels.
According to its size,
use various grass flowers,
scatter them on the altar,
take a lapis lazuli bottle,
fill it with ghee,
and also place seven śarīra grains
inside the bottle.
Place it on the altar.
The practitioner
to the west of the altar,
spread out a clean mat and sit.
With utmost sincerity, kneel,
burn incense, scatter flowers,
and recite the great mantra.
Not more than seven times.
At that time, the śarīra
will emit light,
illuminating the practitioner.
The person reciting the mantra,
with utmost sincerity, bows in reverence and makes a vow.
Take this ghee
and consume it oneself.
All obstacles and difficulties
will be completely eliminated.
Also, take the śarīra,
make a pouch to contain it, and wear it on the head.

original: 一切諸佛菩薩天龍鬼神恒不遠離。
analyzed: 一切諸佛菩薩天龍鬼神恒不遠離。
translated: All buddhas, bodhisattvas, devas, dragons, ghosts, and spirits will always be near.
Surrounding and protecting,
viewing them as if they were buddhas.
All sentient beings,
those who see them will rejoice.
Respectfully making offerings.
Ānanda.
This Dharma is inconceivable.
The power of merit and virtue
can cause sentient beings to have no calamities or difficulties.
The fruits and rewards are complete.
Furthermore, if all sentient beings
see a ferocious beast about to eat them,
chant the mantra and point at it.
It will immediately submit and not rise up.
They will all attain liberation.

original: 復次若黑月二十九日夜。
analyzed: 復次若黑月二十九日夜。
translated: Furthermore, on the night of the twenty-ninth day of the dark half of the month,
face an empty grave in the wilderness.
Burn incense and chant the mantra.
You will then attain the ghost of Piśāca,
who will come and pay homage.
Or bring precious treasures to make offerings.
If you wish to have the messenger watch over things,
you will know all good and evil.
Ānanda.

original: 我今為汝說大印陀羅尼母能破惡業。
analyzed: 我今為汝說大印陀羅尼母能破惡業。
translated: I now tell you the great mudrā dhāraṇī mother who can destroy bad karma.
Bend the two index fingers into the palm.

original: 以二大母指押頭指中節文。
analyzed: 以二大母指押頭指中節文。
translated: Press the middle joint of the index finger with the two thumbs.

original: 上以下三指各合掌誦呪。
analyzed: 上以下三指各合掌誦呪。
translated: With the upper three fingers each joined in the palm, recite the mantra.
This is called the Buddha's Crown Dhāraṇī Mudrā.

original: 阿難復以右手大母指押中指節甲上。
analyzed: 阿難復以右手大母指押中指節甲上。
translated: Ānanda, again use the thumb of the right hand to press the nail of the middle finger,
and extend the other fingers.

original: 名為如來善集陀羅尼印。
analyzed: 名為如來善集陀羅尼印。
translated: This is called the Tathāgata's Well-Collected Dhāraṇī Mudrā.
Next, use the thumb of the right hand
to press the nails of the two little fingers and ring fingers,
and extend the other fingers.
